alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Autauga, southwestern Elmore, northeastern Lowndes and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lowndesboro, or 8 miles north of Hayneville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Pike Road, Elmore, Coosada, White Hall, Lowndesboro, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Autauga County Airport, Woodcrest, Maxwell Air Force Base, Hunter, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Dannelly Field, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium and Pinedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
